spirals.title: Attribute Convention for Data Discovery - Highly Recommended
spirals.description: These attributes are highly recommended by the Attribute Convention for Data Discovery

items.name: Resource Title
items.description: A short description of the resource. The title should be descriptive enough so that when a user is presented with a list of titles the general content of the data set can be determined.

items.name: Abstract
items.note: This concept is called Desciption in Catalog Services for the Web.
items.description: A paragraph describing the resource.

items.name: Keyword
items.description: A word or phrase that describes some aspect of a resource. Can be one of several types.

spirals.title: Attribute Convention for Data Discovery - Recommended
spirals.description: These attributes are recommended by the Attribute Convention for Data Discovery

items.name: Resource Identifier
items.description: Identifier for the resource described by the metadata

items.name: Naming Authority
items.note: DIF and ECHO use the Global Change Master Directory (GCMD) keywords. In DCAT this is a controlled vocabulary with only one value (DOI)
items.description: The organization responsible for the maintenance of the identifier (namespace)

items.name: Keyword Vocabulary
items.note: DIF, ECHO and ECS require that theme keywords come from the Global Change Master Directory list.
items.description: If you are following a guideline or using a shared vocabulary for the words/phrases in your 'keywords' attribute, put the name of that guideline here.

items.name: Common Data Model Datatype
items.note: Current values: vector, grid, textTable, tin, stereoModel, video.
items.description: The THREDDS data type for this resource.

items.name: Lineage Statement
items.description: Information and references for sources and processes that were used to create the dataset and an audit trail for modifications to the original data.

items.name: Supplemental Information
items.description: Miscellaneous information about the data.

items.name: Resource Creation/Revision Date
items.description: The date the resource was created

items.name: Resource Contact
items.description: The organization or person responsible for answering questions about the resource.

items.name: Author / Originator World Wide Web Address
items.description: The World Wide Web mail address of the principal author of the cited resource

items.name: Author / Originator Email Address
items.description: The electronic mail address of the principal author of the resource

items.name: Originating Organization
items.description: The organization responsible for creating the resource

items.name: Project Name
items.description: The name of the project that the resource was associated with.

items.name: Processing Level
items.description: A code that indicates the extent of processing done in the creation of a dataset.

items.name: Acknowledgement
items.description: Provides a place to acknowledge various types of support for the project that produced the data.

items.name: Bounding Box
items.note: This concept is called Coverage in the CSW Specification
items.description: A bounding box for identifying a geographic area of interest

items.name: Southernmost Latitude
items.note: OGC-SOS offering lists may not include the entire dataset. A gml:id attribute can be used to identify the bounding offering.
items.description: The southernmost latitude of the bounding rectangle.

items.name: Northernmost Latitude
items.note: OGC-SOS offering lists may not include the entire dataset. A gml:id attribute (e.g. gml:id=network-all) can be used to identify the bounding offering.
items.description: The northernmost latitude of the bounding rectangle.

items.name: Westernmost Longitude
items.note: OGC-SOS offering lists may not include the entire dataset. A gml:id attribute can be used to identify the bounding offering.
items.description: The westernmost longitude of the bounding rectangle.

items.name: Easternmost Longitude
items.note: OGC-SOS offering lists may not include the entire dataset. A gml:id attribute can be used to identify the bounding offering.
items.description: The easternmost longitude of the bounding rectangle.

items.name: Start Time
items.description: The start of the bounding time period

items.name: End Time
items.description: The end of the bounding time period

items.name: Vertical Minimum
items.description: The minimum height of the bounding rectangle

items.name: Temporal Extent
items.description: The temporal extent of the resource

items.name: Temporal Resolution
items.description: The smallest time step included in the resource.

items.name: Standard Name Vocabulary
items.description: The name of the shared vocabulary from which variable standard names are taken.

items.name: Vertical Maximum
items.description: The maximum height of the bounding rectangle

items.name: Resource Access Constraints
items.description: Information about any constraints for accessing the data set. This includes any special restrictions, legal prerequisites, limitations and/or warnings on obtaining the data set. Some words that may be used in this field include: Public, In-house, Limited, Additional detailed instructions on how to access the data can be entered in this field.

spirals.title: Attribute Convention for Data Discovery - Suggested
spirals.description: These attributes are suggested by the Attribute Convention for Data Discovery

items.name: Contributor Name
items.description: Contributor to the resource

items.name: Contributor Role
items.description: The role of any individuals or institutions that contributed to the creation of the data.

items.name: Publisher
items.description: Publisher of the cited resource

items.name: Publisher URL
items.description: World Wide Web address associated with the publisher of the cited resource

items.name: Publisher E-Mail
items.description: Email associated with the publisher of the cited resource

Some words that may be used in this field include: Public, In-house, Limited, Additional detailed instructions on how to access the data can be entered in this field.

items.description: If you are following a guideline or using a shared vocabulary for the words/phrases in your 'keywords' attribute, put the name of that guideline here.

items.name: Common Data Model Datatype
items.note: Current values: vector, grid, textTable, tin, stereoModel, video.
items.description: The THREDDS data type for this resource.

items.name: Lineage Statement
items.description: Information and references for sources and processes that were used to create the dataset and an audit trail for modifications to the original data.

items.name: Supplemental Information
items.description: Miscellaneous information about the data.

items.name: Resource Creation/Revision Date
items.description: The date the resource was created

items.name: Resource Contact
items.description: The organization or person responsible for answering questions about the resource.

items.name: Author / Originator World Wide Web Address
items.description: The World Wide Web mail address of the principal author of the cited resource

items.name: Author / Originator Email Address
items.description: The electronic mail address of the principal author of the resource

items.name: Originating Organization
items.description: The organization responsible for creating the resource

items.name: Project Name
items.description: The name of the project that the resource was associated with.

items.name: Processing Level
items.description: A code that indicates the extent of processing done in the creation of a dataset.

items.name: Acknowledgement
items.description: Provides a place to acknowledge various types of support for the project that produced the data.

items.name: Bounding Box
items.note: This concept is called Coverage in the CSW Specification
items.description: A bounding box for identifying a geographic area of interest

items.name: Southernmost Latitude
items.note: OGC-SOS offering lists may not include the entire dataset. A gml:id attribute can be used to identify the bounding offering.
items.description: The southernmost latitude of the bounding rectangle.

items.name: Northernmost Latitude
items.note: OGC-SOS offering lists may not include the entire dataset. A gml:id attribute (e.g. gml:id=network-all) can be used to identify the bounding offering.
items.description: The northernmost latitude of the bounding rectangle.

items.name: Westernmost Longitude
items.note: OGC-SOS offering lists may not include the entire dataset. A gml:id attribute can be used to identify the bounding offering.
items.description: The westernmost longitude of the bounding rectangle.

items.name: Easternmost Longitude
items.note: OGC-SOS offering lists may not include the entire dataset. A gml:id attribute can be used to identify the bounding offering.
items.description: The easternmost longitude of the bounding rectangle.

items.name: Start Time
items.description: The start of the bounding time period

items.name: End Time
items.description: The end of the bounding time period

items.name: Vertical Minimum
items.description: The minimum height of the bounding rectangle

items.name: Temporal Extent
items.description: The temporal extent of the resource

items.name: Temporal Resolution
items.description: The smallest time step included in the resource.

items.name: Standard Name Vocabulary
items.description: The name of the shared vocabulary from which variable standard names are taken.

items.name: Vertical Maximum
items.description: The maximum height of the bounding rectangle

items.name: Resource Access Constraints
items.description: Information about any constraints for accessing the data set. This includes any special restrictions, legal prerequisites, limitations and/or warnings on obtaining the data set. Some words that may be used in this field include: Public, In-house, Limited, Additional detailed instructions on how to access the data can be entered in this field.

items.description: A paragraph describing the resource.

items.name: Keyword
items.description: A word or phrase that describes some aspect of a resource. Can be one of several types.

spirals.title: Attribute Convention for Data Discovery - Recommended
spirals.description: These attributes are recommended by the Attribute Convention for Data Discovery

items.name: Resource Identifier
items.description: Identifier for the resource described by the metadata

items.name: Naming Authority
items.note: DIF and ECHO use the Global Change Master Directory (GCMD) keywords. In DCAT this is a controlled vocabulary with only one value (DOI)
items.description: The organization responsible for the maintenance of the identifier (namespace)

items.name: Keyword Vocabulary
items.note: DIF, ECHO and ECS require that theme keywords come from the Global Change Master Directory list.
items.description: If you are following a guideline or using a shared vocabulary for the words/phrases in your 'keywords' attribute, put the name of that guideline here.

items.name: Common Data Model Datatype
items.note: Current values: vector, grid, textTable, tin, stereoModel, video.
items.description: The THREDDS data type for this resource.

items.name: Lineage Statement
items.description: Information and references for sources and processes that were used to create the dataset and an audit trail for modifications to the original data.

items.name: Supplemental Information
items.description: Miscellaneous information about the data.

items.name: Resource Creation/Revision Date
items.description: The date the resource was created

items.name: Resource Contact
items.description: The organization or person responsible for answering questions about the resource.

items.name: Author / Originator World Wide Web Address
items.description: The World Wide Web mail address of the principal author of the cited resource

items.name: Author / Originator Email Address
items.description: The electronic mail address of the principal author of the resource

items.name: Originating Organization
items.description: The organization responsible for creating the resource

items.name: Project Name
items.description: The name of the project that the resource was associated with.

items.name: Processing Level
items.description: A code that indicates the extent of processing done in the creation of a dataset.

items.name: Acknowledgement
items.description: Provides a place to acknowledge various types of support for the project that produced the data.

items.name: Bounding Box
items.note: This concept is called Coverage in the CSW Specification
items.description: A bounding box for identifying a geographic area of interest

items.name: Southernmost Latitude
items.note: OGC-SOS offering lists may not include the entire dataset. A gml:id attribute can be used to identify the bounding offering.
items.description: The southernmost latitude of the bounding rectangle.

items.name: Northernmost Latitude
items.note: OGC-SOS offering lists may not include the entire dataset. A gml:id attribute (e.g. gml:id=network-all) can be used to identify the bounding offering.
items.description: The northernmost latitude of the bounding rectangle.

items.name: Westernmost Longitude
items.note: OGC-SOS offering lists may not include the entire dataset. A gml:id attribute can be used to identify the bounding offering.
items.description: The westernmost longitude of the bounding rectangle.

items.name: Easternmost Longitude
items.note: OGC-SOS offering lists may not include the entire dataset. A gml:id attribute can be used to identify the bounding offering.
items.description: The easternmost longitude of the bounding rectangle.

items.name: Start Time
items.description: The start of the bounding time period

items.name: End Time
items.description: The end of the bounding time period

items.name: Vertical Minimum
items.description: The minimum height of the bounding rectangle

items.name: Temporal Extent
items.description: The temporal extent of the resource

items.name: Temporal Resolution
items.description: The smallest time step included in the resource.

items.name: Standard Name Vocabulary
items.description: The name of the shared vocabulary from which variable standard names are taken.

items.name: Vertical Maximum
items.description: The maximum height of the bounding rectangle

items.name: Resource Access Constraints
items.description: Information about any constraints for accessing the data set. This includes any special restrictions, legal prerequisites, limitations and/or warnings on obtaining the data set. Some words that may be used in this field include: Public, In-house, Limited, Additional detailed instructions on how to access the data can be entered in this field.

items.name: Contributor Name
items.description: Contributor to the resource

items.name: Contributor Role
items.description: The role of any individuals or institutions that contributed to the creation of the data.

items.name: Publisher
items.description: Publisher of the cited resource

items.name: Publisher URL
items.description: World Wide Web address associated with the publisher of the cited resource

items.name: Publisher E-Mail
items.description: Email associated with the publisher of the cited resource

spirals.title: Attribute Convention for Data Discovery - Highly Recommended
spirals.description: These attributes are highly recommended by the Attribute Convention for Data Discovery

items.name: Resource Title
items.description: A short description of the resource. The title should be descriptive enough so that when a user is presented with a list of titles the general content of the data set can be determined.

items.name: Abstract
items.note: This concept is called Desciption in Catalog Services for the Web.
items.description: A paragraph describing the resource.

items.name: Keyword
items.description: A word or phrase that describes some aspect of a resource. Can be one of several types.

spirals.title: Attribute Convention for Data Discovery - Recommended
spirals.description: These attributes are recommended by the Attribute Convention for Data Discovery

items.name: Resource Identifier
items.description: Identifier for the resource described by the metadata

items.name: Naming Authority
items.note: DIF and ECHO use the Global Change Master Directory (GCMD) keywords. In DCAT this is a controlled vocabulary with only one value (DOI)
items.description: The organization responsible for the maintenance of the identifier (namespace)

items.name: Keyword Vocabulary
items.note: DIF, ECHO and ECS require that theme keywords come from the Global Change Master Directory list.
items.description: If you are following a guideline or using a shared vocabulary for the words/phrases in your 'keywords' attribute, put the name of that guideline here.

items.name: Common Data Model Datatype
items.note: Current values: vector, grid, textTable, tin, stereoModel, video.
items.description: The THREDDS data type for this resource.

items.name: Lineage Statement
items.description: Information and references for sources and processes that were used to create the dataset and an audit trail for modifications to the original data.

items.name: Supplemental Information
items.description: Miscellaneous information about the data.

items.name: Resource Creation/Revision Date
items.description: The date the resource was created

items.name: Resource Contact
items.description: The organization or person responsible for answering questions about the resource.

items.name: Author / Originator World Wide Web Address
items.description: The World Wide Web mail address of the principal author of the cited resource

items.name: Author / Originator Email Address
items.description: The electronic mail address of the principal author of the resource

items.name: Originating Organization
items.description: The organization responsible for creating the resource

items.name: Project Name
items.description: The name of the project that the resource was associated with.

items.name: Processing Level
items.description: A code that indicates the extent of processing done in the creation of a dataset.

items.name: Acknowledgement
items.description: Provides a place to acknowledge various types of support for the project that produced the data.

items.name: Bounding Box
items.note: This concept is called Coverage in the CSW Specification
items.description: A bounding box for identifying a geographic area of interest

items.name: Southernmost Latitude
items.note: OGC-SOS offering lists may not include the entire dataset. A gml:id attribute can be used to identify the bounding offering.
items.description: The southernmost latitude of the bounding rectangle.

items.name: Northernmost Latitude
items.note: OGC-SOS offering lists may not include the entire dataset. A gml:id attribute (e.g. gml:id=network-all) can be used to identify the bounding offering.
items.description: The northernmost latitude of the bounding rectangle.

items.name: Westernmost Longitude
items.note: OGC-SOS offering lists may not include the entire dataset. A gml:id attribute can be used to identify the bounding offering.
items.description: The westernmost longitude of the bounding rectangle.

items.name: Easternmost Longitude
items.note: OGC-SOS offering lists may not include the entire dataset. A gml:id attribute can be used to identify the bounding offering.
items.description: The easternmost longitude of the bounding rectangle.

items.name: Start Time
items.description: The start of the bounding time period

items.name: End Time
items.description: The end of the bounding time period

items.name: Vertical Minimum
items.description: The minimum height of the bounding rectangle

items.name: Temporal Extent
items.description: The temporal extent of the resource

items.name: Temporal Resolution
items.description: The smallest time step included in the resource.

items.name: Standard Name Vocabulary
items.description: The name of the shared vocabulary from which variable standard names are taken.

items.name: Vertical Maximum
items.description: The maximum height of the bounding rectangle

items.name: Resource Access Constraints
items.description: Information about any constraints for accessing the data set. This includes any special restrictions, legal prerequisites, limitations and/or warnings on obtaining the data set. Some words that may be used in this field include: Public, In-house, Limited, Additional detailed instructions on how to access the data can be entered in this field.

Some words that may be used in this field include: Public, In-house, Limited, Additional detailed instructions on how to access the data can be entered in this field.

items.description: If you are following a guideline or using a shared vocabulary for the words/phrases in your 'keywords' attribute, put the name of that guideline here.

items.name: Common Data Model Datatype
items.note: Current values: vector, grid, textTable, tin, stereoModel, video.
items.description: The THREDDS data type for this resource.

items.name: Lineage Statement
items.description: Information and references for sources and processes that were used to create the dataset and an audit trail for modifications to the original data.

items.name: Supplemental Information
items.description: Miscellaneous information about the data.

items.name: Resource Creation/Revision Date
items.description: The date the resource was created

items.name: Resource Contact
items.description: The organization or person responsible for answering questions about the resource.

items.name: Author / Originator World Wide Web Address
items.description: The World Wide Web mail address of the principal author of the cited resource

items.name: Author / Originator Email Address
items.description: The electronic mail address of the principal author of the resource

items.name: Originating Organization
items.description: The organization responsible for creating the resource

items.name: Project Name
items.description: The name of the project that the resource was associated with.

items.name: Processing Level
items.description: A code that indicates the extent of processing done in the creation of a dataset.

items.name: Acknowledgement
items.description: Provides a place to acknowledge various types of support for the project that produced the data.

items.name: Bounding Box
items.note: This concept is called Coverage in the CSW Specification
items.description: A bounding box for identifying a geographic area of interest

items.name: Southernmost Latitude
items.note: OGC-SOS offering lists may not include the entire dataset. A gml:id attribute can be used to identify the bounding offering.
items.description: The southernmost latitude of the bounding rectangle.

items.name: Northernmost Latitude
items.note: OGC-SOS offering lists may not include the entire dataset. A gml:id attribute (e.g. gml:id=network-all) can be used to identify the bounding offering.
items.description: The northernmost latitude of the bounding rectangle.

items.name: Westernmost Longitude
items.note: OGC-SOS offering lists may not include the entire dataset. A gml:id attribute can be used to identify the bounding offering.
items.description: The westernmost longitude of the bounding rectangle.

items.name: Easternmost Longitude
items.note: OGC-SOS offering lists may not include the entire dataset. A gml:id attribute can be used to identify the bounding offering.
items.description: The easternmost longitude of the bounding rectangle.

items.name: Start Time
items.description: The start of the bounding time period

items.name: End Time
items.description: The end of the bounding time period

items.name: Vertical Minimum
items.description: The minimum height of the bounding rectangle

items.name: Temporal Extent
items.description: The temporal extent of the resource

items.name: Temporal Resolution
items.description: The smallest time step included in the resource.

items.name: Standard Name Vocabulary
items.description: The name of the shared vocabulary from which variable standard names are taken.

items.name: Vertical Maximum
items.description: The maximum height of the bounding rectangle

items.name: Resource Access Constraints
items.description: Information about any constraints for accessing the data set. This includes any special restrictions, legal prerequisites, limitations and/or warnings on obtaining the data set. Some words that may be used in this field include: Public, In-house, Limited, Additional detailed instructions on how to access the data can be entered in this field.

items.description: A paragraph describing the resource.

items.name: Keyword
items.description: A word or phrase that describes some aspect of a resource. Can be one of several types.

spirals.title: Attribute Convention for Data Discovery - Recommended
spirals.description: These attributes are recommended by the Attribute Convention for Data Discovery

items.name: Resource Identifier
items.description: Identifier for the resource described by the metadata

items.name: Naming Authority
items.note: DIF and ECHO use the Global Change Master Directory (GCMD) keywords. In DCAT this is a controlled vocabulary with only one value (DOI)
items.description: The organization responsible for the maintenance of the identifier (namespace)

items.name: Keyword Vocabulary
items.note: DIF, ECHO and ECS require that theme keywords come from the Global Change Master Directory list.
items.description: If you are following a guideline or using a shared vocabulary for the words/phrases in your 'keywords' attribute, put the name of that guideline here.

items.name: Common Data Model Datatype
items.note: Current values: vector, grid, textTable, tin, stereoModel, video.
items.description: The THREDDS data type for this resource.

items.name: Lineage Statement
items.description: Information and references for sources and processes that were used to create the dataset and an audit trail for modifications to the original data.

items.name: Supplemental Information
items.description: Miscellaneous information about the data.

items.name: Resource Creation/Revision Date
items.description: The date the resource was created

items.name: Resource Contact
items.description: The organization or person responsible for answering questions about the resource.

items.name: Author / Originator World Wide Web Address
items.description: The World Wide Web mail address of the principal author of the cited resource

items.name: Author / Originator Email Address
items.description: The electronic mail address of the principal author of the resource

items.name: Originating Organization
items.description: The organization responsible for creating the resource

items.name: Project Name
items.description: The name of the project that the resource was associated with.

items.name: Processing Level
items.description: A code that indicates the extent of processing done in the creation of a dataset.

items.name: Acknowledgement
items.description: Provides a place to acknowledge various types of support for the project that produced the data.

items.name: Bounding Box
items.note: This concept is called Coverage in the CSW Specification
items.description: A bounding box for identifying a geographic area of interest

items.name: Southernmost Latitude
items.note: OGC-SOS offering lists may not include the entire dataset. A gml:id attribute can be used to identify the bounding offering.
items.description: The southernmost latitude of the bounding rectangle.

items.name: Northernmost Latitude
items.note: OGC-SOS offering lists may not include the entire dataset. A gml:id attribute (e.g. gml:id=network-all) can be used to identify the bounding offering.
items.description: The northernmost latitude of the bounding rectangle.

items.name: Westernmost Longitude
items.note: OGC-SOS offering lists may not include the entire dataset. A gml:id attribute can be used to identify the bounding offering.
items.description: The westernmost longitude of the bounding rectangle.

items.name: Easternmost Longitude
items.note: OGC-SOS offering lists may not include the entire dataset. A gml:id attribute can be used to identify the bounding offering.
items.description: The easternmost longitude of the bounding rectangle.

items.name: Start Time
items.description: The start of the bounding time period

items.name: End Time
items.description: The end of the bounding time period

items.name: Vertical Minimum
items.description: The minimum height of the bounding rectangle

items.name: Temporal Extent
items.description: The temporal extent of the resource

items.name: Temporal Resolution
items.description: The smallest time step included in the resource.

items.name: Standard Name Vocabulary
items.description: The name of the shared vocabulary from which variable standard names are taken.

items.name: Vertical Maximum
items.description: The maximum height of the bounding rectangle

items.name: Resource Access Constraints
items.description: Information about any constraints for accessing the data set. This includes any special restrictions, legal prerequisites, limitations and/or warnings on obtaining the data set. Some words that may be used in this field include: Public, In-house, Limited, Additional detailed instructions on how to access the data can be entered in this field.

items.name: Contributor Name
items.description: Contributor to the resource

items.name: Contributor Role
items.description: The role of any individuals or institutions that contributed to the creation of the data.

items.name: Publisher
items.description: Publisher of the cited resource

items.name: Publisher URL
items.description: World Wide Web address associated with the publisher of the cited resource

items.name: Publisher E-Mail
items.description: Email associated with the publisher of the cited resource

spirals.title: Attribute Convention for Data Discovery - Highly Recommended
spirals.description: These attributes are highly recommended by the Attribute Convention for Data Discovery

items.name: Resource Title
items.description: A short description of the resource. The title should be descriptive enough so that when a user is presented with a list of titles the general content of the data set can be determined.

items.name: Abstract
items.note: This concept is called Desciption in Catalog Services for the Web.
items.description: A paragraph describing the resource.

items.name: Keyword
items.description: A word or phrase that describes some aspect of a resource. Can be one of several types.

spirals.title: Attribute Convention for Data Discovery - Recommended
spirals.description: These attributes are recommended by the Attribute Convention for Data Discovery

items.name: Resource Identifier
items.description: Identifier for the resource described by the metadata

items.name: Naming Authority
items.note: DIF and ECHO use the Global Change Master Directory (GCMD) keywords. In DCAT this is a controlled vocabulary with only one value (DOI)
items.description: The organization responsible for the maintenance of the identifier (namespace)

items.name: Keyword Vocabulary
items.note: DIF, ECHO and ECS require that theme keywords come from the Global Change Master Directory list.
items.description: If you are following a guideline or using a shared vocabulary for the words/phrases in your 'keywords' attribute, put the name of that guideline here.

items.name: Common Data Model Datatype
items.note: Current values: vector, grid, textTable, tin, stereoModel, video.
items.description: The THREDDS data type for this resource.

items.name: Lineage Statement
items.description: Information and references for sources and processes that were used to create the dataset and an audit trail for modifications to the original data.

items.name: Supplemental Information
items.description: Miscellaneous information about the data.

items.name: Resource Creation/Revision Date
items.description: The date the resource was created

items.name: Resource Contact
items.description: The organization or person responsible for answering questions about the resource.

items.name: Author / Originator World Wide Web Address
items.description: The World Wide Web mail address of the principal author of the cited resource

items.name: Author / Originator Email Address
items.description: The electronic mail address of the principal author of the resource

items.name: Originating Organization
items.description: The organization responsible for creating the resource

items.name: Project Name
items.description: The name of the project that the resource was associated with.

items.name: Processing Level
items.description: A code that indicates the extent of processing done in the creation of a dataset.

items.name: Acknowledgement
items.description: Provides a place to acknowledge various types of support for the project that produced the data.

items.name: Bounding Box
items.note: This concept is called Coverage in the CSW Specification
items.description: A bounding box for identifying a geographic area of interest

items.name: Southernmost Latitude
items.note: OGC-SOS offering lists may not include the entire dataset. A gml:id attribute can be used to identify the bounding offering.
items.description: The southernmost latitude of the bounding rectangle.

items.name: Northernmost Latitude
items.note: OGC-SOS offering lists may not include the entire dataset. A gml:id attribute (e.g. gml:id=network-all) can be used to identify the bounding offering.
items.description: The northernmost latitude of the bounding rectangle.

items.name: Westernmost Longitude
items.note: OGC-SOS offering lists may not include the entire dataset. A gml:id attribute can be used to identify the bounding offering.
items.description: The westernmost longitude of the bounding rectangle.

items.name: Easternmost Longitude
items.note: OGC-SOS offering lists may not include the entire dataset. A gml:id attribute can be used to identify the bounding offering.
items.description: The easternmost longitude of the bounding rectangle.

items.name: Start Time
items.description: The start of the bounding time period

items.name: End Time
items.description: The end of the bounding time period

items.name: Vertical Minimum
items.description: The minimum height of the bounding rectangle

items.name: Temporal Extent
items.description: The temporal extent of the resource

items.name: Temporal Resolution
items.description: The smallest time step included in the resource.

items.name: Standard Name Vocabulary
items.description: The name of the shared vocabulary from which variable standard names are taken.

items.name: Vertical Maximum
items.description: The maximum height of the bounding rectangle

items.name: Resource Access Constraints
items.description: Information about any constraints for accessing the data set. This includes any special restrictions, legal prerequisites, limitations and/or warnings on obtaining the data set. Some words that may be used in this field include: Public, In-house, Limited, Additional detailed instructions on how to access the data can be entered in this field.

Some words that may be used in this field include: Public, In-house, Limited, Additional detailed instructions on how to access the data can be entered in this field.
